sen.j: 紀長谷雄が朱雀門で鬼と「双六」をして、勝ちをおさめた。
sen.e: A Sugoroku (a Japanese style board game played with dices) master, KI no Haseo, played a Sugoroku game with an Oni (Japanese ogre) at the Suzaku-mon Gate and won the game. Haseo bet his whole asset and the ogre promised a woman of unsurpassed beauty for his stake.
